job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongAbout UsnbspstrongppnbspppBlockworks is a fastgrowing financial media brand that delivers breaking news and premium insights about digital assets to millions of investorsnbspppbrppOur editorial content newsletters podcasts and events provide investors with the critical analysis and information they need to make smarter decisions about digital assetsppnbspppstrongAbout the RolestrongppnbspppAs our second engineering hire youll have a unique opportunity to own several different projects and help us build the engineering team and tech stackppbrppWere looking for a Software Engineer who has a passion for building web experiences users will love has strong design sensibilities and is comfortable working with both frontend and backend codeppbrppThis is a unique opportunity to influence the product and technical direction of a fastpaced growing startupnbspppbrppWe want to find the best person for the role regardless of where you are located This role is open for candidates who are working remote as well as candidates who prefer to work from our New York City officeppbrppstrongWhat Youll DostrongppnbsppollistrongPlan shape and build new product featuresstrong from start to finish through conception research implementation and maintenancelilistrongExamples of product features includestrong build data metrics into our website build a referral campaign on top of our newsletter increase site speed integrate 3rd party services into our website and newsletter build podcast pages that automatically update upon release of shows create pages for crypto charts and morelilistrongHelp build both our tech stack and our engineering teamstronglilistrongCollaborate with our marketing and editorial teamsstrong to deliver and learn from experiments that move core business metricslilistrongGet to know the Blockworks readerstrong to understand key points in their journey and uncover insights that will drive activation and engagementliolpnbspppstrongWhat Were Looking Forstrongppnbsppulli2 years of full stack experienceliliSkilled in HTML CSS and PHPliliExperience building custom WordPress themesliliDemonstrated ability to make beautiful websites and web appsliliWellversed in modern frontend frameworks and best practices including a robust knowledge of web application performancenbspliliComfortable making decisions in ambiguous situations with changing or unknown requirementsliliPrior experience in a small startup or incubator environmentliliStrong project scoping and project management skillsnbspliliOur current website is on WordPress but youll have the opportunity to expand off of WordPressliliBonus media or publisher experience experience making product decisions based on data and AB testing SEO vision insurancelili401k planliliRemote workstation stipendliliTraining amp developmentliliLearning stipendliliTeam happy hours and outings even while remoteliliGenerous vacation and PTO policyliliCommuter benefitsliulpbrppstrongWhat We Need From YoustrongppbrppIf this sounds like a place you could make your mark please submit your portfolio and resumeLinkedIn to careersblockworksco with Engineer  Your Name in the subject linenbspppnbspppWe know that diversity makes for the best problemsolving and creative thinking We are dedicated to adding new perspectives to the team and
